name: property-value
description: Represents a value of a BACnet property, including property identifier, optional array index, value, and optional priority.

fields.name: identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the property whose value is given.

fields.name: index
fields.description: The index within an array property, if applicable. Optional.

fields.name: value
fields.description: The value of the specified property.

fields.name: priority
fields.description: The priority of the value, if applicable. Optional.
